message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $120. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $90, so I'll offer you the product for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think $95 is still a bit too low for me. I'll offer you the product for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
